Title: Our nation's millions of Red Guards resolutely support the patriotic compatriots of Hong Kong and Kowloon in their anti-English struggle against violent repression!
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: One of the Red Guards carries a placard with text "坚决反击英帝国主义" (Resolutely strike back at British imperialism) and Mao's Selected Works.
